question: Do the tutors have experience teaching tuition?
answer: Yes. All our tutors have been teaching since 2022/23. Please view the individual tutors’ page for more information.

question: Have the tutors taught in a group setting before?
answer: Yes. Shawn, Tenor and Jaryl have hosted a crash course for 15 A Level students in 2025. Kaiser has experience teaching private group tuition. The four tutors have now come together to create something greater than themselves.

question: How is Vivota different from normal tuition?
answer: Most centres just overload you with notes and homework. At Vivota, every student enters the Vivota Learning System: Vivota Mentors check in with students, a two-session cycle (Concept Class → Team Session), and a simple actionable 14-day plan. We diagnose your gaps, teach only what matters for exams, and keep tuning the plan until your marks move.

question: What if the student is unable to make it for the lesson due to last minute commitments?
answer: There are 2 sessions a week per subject. They can come for the other session. If that is also not feasible, fret not — all our sessions are recorded so students who are absent can replay the lesson in the comfort of their own home.
